ShivaH/Luzbel/Attilla::

"Foool cat!!!!"shouted Shivah"This FOrtress can block your weak 
commlink....!!!! BROTHER! MAKE HER SHUT UP!!!!"


"YOu hear him bro. "said Luzbel "Shot!"

Attilla used the dartgun and he shot two sleep darts to Panzer.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> Panzer::
> She tried to struggle, but quickly found it useless. The dragon had 
> too strong a grip on her.  She tired her last ditch effort. She 
> opened her comlink. A small wire popped out of her ear and went 
down 
> infront of her mouth. She called out on every maximal frequency. 
She 
> knew she'd only have a few seonds to transmit before they stopped 
> her. "Maximal Scout Panzer needs assistance in the Black Fortress! 
> Will be reprogrammed in minutes! Please assist!REPEAT! MAXIMAL 
NEEDS 
> HELP IN THE BLACK FORTRESS!" She prayed to the matrix that some bot 
> out there heard her and would get here in time. 
>
